__e: I thought you might like to know I was moved by what you said about my decision not to trust our long lost sister, so I waited until she revived, and when she did, we had quite a chat.
Wait, if he didn't come back to life, does that mean my sisters won't either?
Did you know this is not the first time nature's come alive?
I know it's fast, but it's like I snapped out of this coma and she was the first face that I saw.
Everything around you has come to life tonight for the very first time... all because of this tablet.
